title: What to know about Canada’s residential schools and the unmarked graves found nearby
content:
1. What to know about Canada’s residential schools and the unmarked graves found nearby  The Washington Post
  2. Canadian First Nation chiefs ask for reckoning after 751 unmarked graves discovered  Guardian News
  3. Report: over 600 bodies found at Indigenous school in Canada  Fox News
  4. Trudeau: 'Canadians are horrified and ashamed'  POLITICO
  5. 751 Unmarked Graves Uncovered at Former Residential School in Saskatchewan  Breakfast Television
